Gardaí have arrested a 41 - year - old man in relation to a carjacking involving a mother and two children in Terenure , south Dublin on Friday .
A man got into the back of her grey BMW estate , threatened her and demanded money from her .
The woman later told gardaí she sounded the horn when he jumped into the car .

Gardaí have appealed for anyone who was close to the junction of Zion Rd and Orwell Rd around 3.40 pm and saw a suspicious man or anyone who saw unusual behaviour near the AIB Bank ATM in Rathgar between 4.05 pm and 4.10 pm to contact them in Terenure on 01-6666400 , the Garda Confidential Line on 1800-666111 or any Garda station .
